scripts.prepare: yarn run prepare:generator && yarn run prepare:packages
scripts.prepare:generator: yarn run bootstrap:generator && yarn run build:generator && yarn run link:generator
scripts.link:generator: lerna exec --scope generator-theia --stream -- yarn link && yarn link generator-theia
scripts.prepare:packages: yarn run bootstrap && yarn run clean && yarn run clean:rebuild && yarn run build
scripts.refresh: node scripts/lerna clean --scope "@theia/*" --yes && yarn run bootstrap
scripts.test: yarn run test:theia && yarn run test:electron && yarn run test:browser
scripts.test:browser: yarn run rebuild:browser && node scripts/lerna run test --scope "@theia/example-browser"
scripts.test:electron: yarn run rebuild:electron && node scripts/lerna run test --scope "@theia/example-electron"
scripts.publish: yarn && yarn test && yarn run publish:latest && node scripts/update-versions
